snippet: A judge said that Republicans “made a mockery” of an amendment meant to inject fairness into a process that has long been politically tainted.
abstract: Florida's Second Judicial Court Judge Terry P Lewis rules Republicans illegally redrew state's congressional district, and orders 10th and Fifth Districts be redrawn.
lead_paragraph: A judge said that Republicans “made a mockery” of an amendment meant to inject fairness into a process that has long been politically tainted.

headline.main: Judge Rules G.O.P. Illegally Redrew Florida Districts
headline.print_headline: Judge Rules G.O.P. Illegally Redrew Florida Districts
